name: admin
description: Admin overview for mail, skills, and wallet monitoring.

fields.label: Mail poll interval
fields.help: How often to poll mail for every character (e.g. 15m, 1h).

fields.label: Mail history retention
fields.help: How long mail data is stored in history (e.g. 7d, 1w).

fields.label: Mail data fetch cooldown
fields.help: Cooldown between mail data refresh requests in the admin panel.

fields.label: Mail max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of mail entries stored per character.

fields.label: Skills poll interval
fields.help: How often to poll skills for every character (e.g. 30m, 2h).

fields.label: Skills history retention
fields.help: How long skill snapshots are stored in history (e.g. 30d).

fields.label: Skills data fetch cooldown
fields.help: Cooldown between skills data refresh requests in the admin panel.

fields.label: Skills max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of skill snapshots stored per character.

fields.label: Training queue poll interval
fields.help: How often to poll training queue data for every character (e.g. 1h).

fields.label: Training queue history retention
fields.help: How long training queue history is stored (e.g. 30d).

fields.label: Training queue max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of training queue entries stored per character.

fields.label: Wallet poll interval
fields.help: How often to poll wallet snapshots for every character (e.g. 15m).

fields.label: ISK history window
fields.help: How long ISK history summaries are stored (e.g. 30d).

fields.label: ISK history data fetch cooldown
fields.help: Cooldown between ISK history refresh requests in the admin panel.

fields.label: ISK history max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of wallet history points stored per character.
